thread.title: Kyland-USA - DEMEC Division Expands Traffic Analytics
thread.title_full: Kyland-USA - DEMEC Division Expands Traffic Analytics

author: Ray Renaud
title: Kyland-USA - DEMEC Division Expands Traffic Analytics
text:
Kyland-USA-INC a national leader in the supply of High Security advanced traffic Ethernet switch and transportation analytics for safety and mobility, today announced that it's DYMEC Traffic Division has partnered with Houston Traffic to sell, promote and support it's advanced line of traffic analytics. We are pleased to have reached this strategic partnership agreement with Houston Radar, Said Ray Renaud, VP of Sales for Kyland-USA-DYMEC. Meeting the ever changing needs for our traffic partners is our top priority to grow our brand and Houston Radar will be an integral partner moving forward.
Under the agreement DYMEC BlueWarrior Division will distribute and sell Houston Radars advanced SpeedLane and Armadillo stat collection products nationally.
About Kyland-USA (VOSB).
Kyland-USA products are renowned for leading edge technology in the traffic and industrial marketplace. Exceptional high security features for Ethernet switches and secure networks include embedded, Cyber Secure Video, Cyber-Lock, Crypto-Linkage, Clean Code Technology and Device Binding (Patent Pending).
DYMEC is a registered trademark of Kyland-USA.com
For more information about Kyland-USA and DyMEC products please contact:
